backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing chatrooms, messages, reactions, user profiles, active users, and access control with admin-only deletion of all chatrooms.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing two frontend requirements tied to adding a delete-all-chatrooms admin button and corresponding React Query mutation.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of all major frontend components, hooks, pages, and styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point containing root div and script loader for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, global layout with conditional header/footer, theme provider, and 404 handling.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Dialog for selecting, uploading, or removing user avatars with Giphy search and image upload support.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Main chat area handling message display, auto-scroll, sending messages, replies, pinned video, and expandable header.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: React audio player with waveform visualization, playback controls, and syncing between multiple audio elements.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Provides a debounced version of a value with a configurable delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity context and provider handling login, stored identity restoration, and auth-client initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for chatrooms, messages, reactions, and user metadata with actor integration and local storage helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with theme variables, dark mode styles, mobile input tweaks, and custom styles for the voice message player.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Provides compact number formatting for values in the thousands, millions, or billions.
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Wrapper for Giphy API search and trending endpoints, returning normalized GIF data and handling errors.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Provides client-side image compression with resizing, quality control, and progress callbacks, returning the compressed file only if smaller.
frontend/src/lib/twitterEmbedRenderer.ts: Empty placeholder file for future Twitter embed rendering logic.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches and parses Twitter oEmbed data into a safe preview object with caching and request deduplication.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: Implements localStorage-based caching for Twitter oEmbed previews with validation and expiration.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnail.ts: Empty placeholder file for generating or handling Twitter thumbnail URLs.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnailCache.t: Empty placeholder file for caching Twitter thumbnails.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Extracts IDs from YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter URLs and generates related thumbnail and embed URLs.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Admin page that authenticates via a hardcoded password and provides UI to delete chatrooms.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Loads a chatroom, increments view count, handles loading/error states, and renders the chat interface.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Implements the chatroom lobby with search, category filters, loading states, and navigation to individual chatrooms.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend build.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, existing features, pending feature requests, and guidance for planned delete-all-chatrooms functionality.
